verbose_text: Consistent with the role of Oct4 as an inhibitor of the neuroectodermal lineage, ectopic expression of Oct4 in ESCs limited the induction of neuroectodermal differentiation genes by BET inhibitors.
evidence: Oct4 as an inhibitor of the neuroectodermal lineage, ectopic expression of Oct4 in ESCs limited the induction of neuroectodermal differentiation
